00023 ComponentTreeView::ComponentTreeView(LibraryInterface* handler,
00024                                                                          const VLNV& compVLNV,
00025                                                                          QWidget *parent):
00026 QTreeView(parent),
00027 pressedPoint_(),
00028 locked_(true),
00029 fileOpenAction_(tr("Open"), this),
00030 handler_(handler),
00031 componentVLNV_(compVLNV) {
00032         
00033         // header is not shown 
00034         setHeaderHidden(true);
00035 
00036         setIndentation(20);
00037 
00038         // alternating row colors to make reading easier
00039         //setAlternatingRowColors(true);
00040 
00041         // only one item can be selected at a time
00042         setSelectionMode(QAbstractItemView::SingleSelection);
00043 
00044         setSelectionBehavior(QAbstractItemView::SelectItems);
00045 
00046         connect(&fileOpenAction_, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00047                 this, SLOT(onFileOpen()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00048         fileOpenAction_.setToolTip(tr("Open the file in operating system's default editor."));
00049         fileOpenAction_.setStatusTip(tr("Open the file in operating system's default editor."));
00050 }

00056 void ComponentTreeView::currentChanged(const QModelIndex & current, 
00057                                                                            const QModelIndex & previous ) 
00058 {
00059         // call the base class implementation
00060         QTreeView::currentChanged(current, previous);
00061 
00062         // inform that the current index has changed
00063         emit activated(current);
00064 }

00070 void ComponentTreeView::mousePressEvent( QMouseEvent* event ) {
00071         pressedPoint_ = event->pos();
00072         QTreeView::mousePressEvent(event);
00073 }

00075 void ComponentTreeView::mouseReleaseEvent( QMouseEvent* event ) {
00076 
00077         // calculate the distance of the drag
00078         //int distance = (event->pos() - pressedPoint_).manhattanLength();
00079 
00080         // make sure widget is not locked
00081         if (!locked_) {
00082 
00083                 QModelIndex pressedIndex = indexAt(pressedPoint_);
00084 
00085                 QModelIndex releaseIndex = indexAt(event->pos());
00086 
00087                 // if either index is invalid or indexes are the same
00088                 if (!releaseIndex.isValid() || !pressedIndex.isValid() || 
00089                         (releaseIndex == pressedIndex)) {
00090                         
00091                         // do the normal release event functionality
00092                         QTreeView::mouseReleaseEvent(event);
00093 
00094                         // restore the normal cursor
00095                         setCursor(QCursor(Qt::ArrowCursor));
00096                         return;
00097                 }
00098 
00099                 QModelIndex parent1 = pressedIndex.model()->parent(pressedIndex);
00100                 QModelIndex parent2 = releaseIndex.model()->parent(releaseIndex);
00101 
00102                 if (parent1.isValid() && parent1 == parent2) {
00103                         emit moveItem(pressedIndex, releaseIndex);
00104 
00105                         QModelIndex newIndex = indexAt(event->pos());
00106                         setCurrentIndex(newIndex);
00107                         emit activated(newIndex);
00108                 }
00109         }
00110 
00111         // restore the normal cursor
00112         setCursor(QCursor(Qt::ArrowCursor));
00113 
00114         QTreeView::mouseReleaseEvent(event);
00115 }
00116 
00117 void ComponentTreeView::mouseMoveEvent( QMouseEvent* event ) {
00118 
00119         // if not dragging an item or item is locked
00120         if (event->buttons() == Qt::NoButton || locked_)
00121                 QTreeView::mouseMoveEvent(event);
00122         
00123         // if dragging item
00124         else {
00125                 QModelIndex startIndex = indexAt(pressedPoint_);
00126                 QModelIndex thisIndex = indexAt(event->pos());
00127 
00128                 // if either index is invalid then dragging is not possible
00129                 if (!startIndex.isValid() || !thisIndex.isValid()) {
00130                         setCursor(QCursor(Qt::ForbiddenCursor));
00131                         return;
00132                 }
00133 
00134                 QModelIndex parent1 = startIndex.model()->parent(startIndex);
00135                 QModelIndex parent2 = thisIndex.model()->parent(thisIndex);
00136 
00137                 // if both have same parent
00138                 if (parent1 == parent2) {
00139                         setCursor(QCursor(Qt::ClosedHandCursor));
00140                 }
00141                 else {
00142                         setCursor(QCursor(Qt::ForbiddenCursor));
00143                 }
00144         }
00145 }
00146 
00147 void ComponentTreeView::setLocked( bool locked ) {
00148         locked_ = locked;
00149 }

00151 void ComponentTreeView::selectItem( const QModelIndex& index ) {
00152         selectionModel()->select(index, QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect);
00153 }

00155 void ComponentTreeView::contextMenuEvent( QContextMenuEvent* event ) {
00156         QModelIndex index = indexAt(event->pos());
00157         
00158         // save the position where click occurred
00159         pressedPoint_ = event->pos();
00160 
00161         ComponentTreeItem* item = static_cast<ComponentTreeItem*>(index.internalPointer());
00162 
00163         if (item->type() == ComponentTreeItem::FILE) {
00164                 QMenu menu(this);
00165                 menu.addAction(&fileOpenAction_);
00166                 menu.exec(event->globalPos());
00167         }
00168 
00169         event->accept();
00170 }
00171 
00172 void ComponentTreeView::mouseDoubleClickEvent( QMouseEvent* event ) {
00173         QModelIndex index = indexAt(event->pos());
00174 
00175         // save the position where click occurred
00176         pressedPoint_ = event->pos();
00177 
00178         ComponentTreeItem* item = static_cast<ComponentTreeItem*>(index.internalPointer());
00179 
00180         if (item->type() == ComponentTreeItem::FILE) {
00181                 onFileOpen();
00182         }
00183 
00184         event->accept();
00185 }
00186 
00187 
00188 void ComponentTreeView::onFileOpen() {
00189         const QString xmlPath = handler_->getPath(componentVLNV_);
00190         
00191         QModelIndex index = indexAt(pressedPoint_);
00192         ComponentTreeItem* item = static_cast<ComponentTreeItem*>(index.internalPointer());
00193         Q_ASSERT(item->type() == ComponentTreeItem::FILE);
00194 
00195         // get the relative path of the file
00196         const QString relFilePath = item->text();
00197 
00198         // get the absolute file path to the file
00199         const QString absolutePath = General::getAbsolutePath(xmlPath, relFilePath);
00200 
00201         // open the file in operating system's default editor
00202         QDesktopServices::openUrl(QUrl::fromLocalFile(absolutePath));
00203 }
